description: Postgres is great as an OLTP database, but for certain activities can create some heartburn - cuch as when calculating uniques across millions of records. The extensions model allows for a lot of flexibility for Postgres going beyond simply relational SQL. One such extension is postgresql-hll based on the HyperLogLog paper which we'll highlight here.

title: Craig Kerstiens: Scalable Uniques in Postgres - HyperLogLog
